mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and brown on white) announcing Rites of Spring featuring Ben Folds, My Morning Jacket, Clap Your Hands Say Yeah, Gov't Mule, Secret Machines, Blue Merle, Ben Lee, Matt Pondpa, Cary Brothers, B Young, Bone Thugs-N-Harmony, Oldunion, Zac Brown Band, Hot Buttered Rum, Hopsing Project, Kate Voegle, and Mr. Blotto at Vanderbilt University on April 21 and 22. Poster features woodcuts of birds.

subject.topic: Clap Your Hands Say Yeah (Musical group)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
